sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

const ListReviews = ({ reviews }) => {
    return ( <
        div class = "reviews w-75" >
        <
        h3 > BÌNH LUẬN SẢN PHẨM: < /h3> <
        hr / > {
            reviews && reviews.map(review => ( <
                div key = { review._id }
                class = "review-card my-3" >
                <
                p class = "review_user" >
                <
                figure className = "avatar avatar-nav" >
                <
                img src = "https://static2.yan.vn/YanNews/2167221/202102/facebook-cap-nhat-avatar-doi-voi-tai-khoan-khong-su-dung-anh-dai-dien-e4abd14d.jpg"
                alt = ''
                className = "rounded-circle" /
                >
                <
                /figure> <
                b > { review.name } < /b>  <
                div class = "rating-outer" >
                <
                div class = "rating-inner"
                style = {
                    { width: `${(review.rating / 5) * 100}%` } } > < /div> <
                /div> <
                /p>

                <
                p class = "review_comment text-primary" > { review.comment } < /p>

                <
                hr / >
                <
                /div>
            ))
        } <
        /div>
    )
}

export default ListReviews
